title: Sweet Music on Moonlight Ridge
description: Welcome to Moonlight Ridge, a magical, musical place overlooking a small town named Eden. Here you'll meet a pair of intrepid eight-year-old cousins, Lily Claire and Willie T., and their multi-ethnic family in the backwoods of Alabama.This is a story about family and community ties, loyalty and faith, and a very unusual map used by two flamboyant children to solve a mystery "out on the mountain." This is a Southern story filled with humor, mystery, surprises, and a touch of the supernatural, in the 1950s backwoods of Alabama. First published in 2010 by Chalet Publishers LLC, now published as Book One of The Moonlight Ridge Series.
author: Ramey Channell
